summary: This mod brings Goffard Gaffgarion from Final Fantasy Tactics into Skyrim. You can find him in the Blue Palace, in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=5]Gaffgarion Follower[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod brings the Dark Knight Goffard Gaffgarion from Final Fantasy Tactics into Skyrim.
You can find him in the Blue Palace, in Solitude.[/size][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Essential
[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Special Blood Sword Weapon[/size][/font]

[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
